ADS-B Out Fly today with a complete solution and prepare for the future with Flightstar's ADS-B Out STC. By Jan.1, 2020, all operators must have Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast capability.
As a staple in NextGen technology, ADS-B Out increases efficiency, strengthens situational awareness and allows aircraft to transmit information to Air Traffic Control ground stations by using satellite signals instead of ground radar and navigational aids. As a result, ATC is able to keep your aircraft properly spaced in high-density traffic areas.
Flightstar's ADS-B Out STC# ST04061CH provides:
- Reduced separation and highly accurate departure and arrival times
- Surveillance in areas that do not currently have radar coverage
- A clear view of vehicles and runways in order to avoid collisions or delays
- More efficient spacing and optimal routing in non-radar environments, including the busy airspace in the Gulf of Mexico, mountainous regions of Colorado and the lower altitudes of Alaska
Honeywell's Integrated Solutions When you upgrade your existing Honeywell solution, you’ll enjoy a cost-effective solution combined with the latest configuration to meet the ADS-B Out mandate. Fly with confidence with Honeywell's integrated solutions equipped with a Mode S Transponder to fulfill ADS-B Out requirements and ensure your future travel plans.
Flightstar's ADS-B Out Program Upgrade your Citation Learjet 40/45 with an integrated solution at Flightstar's maintenance facility at their University of Illinois-Willard Airport maintenance facility.
